name: Ratscape Extended Edition
description:
This Game is made for GMTK

SAM was a laboratory rat, and it has been made experiments on for a long time. As a result of all these experiments, he gains electro-magnetism powers by accident. He unleashes himself from the cage and goes into the rat holes in the wall in order to escape from the laboratory. With his new power, he can connect boxes to one another and uses this to escape and get his freedom.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Creators ;

Program & Level Design: Kerim ZENGİN 

SFX & Music : Batuhan ŞAYER

Animation & PixelArt: Gökalp COŞKUNTUNA

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls ;

Movement and Jump : Arrow Keys 

Melee magnet : E 

Ranged magnet : Q

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Boxes ;

A common box with no special abilities. Can be connected with all other boxes. Jump box makes you be able to jump higher.
Newton box does not move while connecting with other boxes Anti-gravity box changes the current gravity center of Sam When the magnet box is connected with other boxes it becomes airborne
